template.name: Template App Nginx by HTTP
template.description:
Get metrics from stub status module using HTTP agent https://nginx.ru/en/docs/http/ngx_http_stub_status_module.html.
You can discuss this template or leave feedback on our forum https://www.zabbix.com/forum/zabbix-suggestions-and-feedback/384765-discussion-thread-for-official-zabbix-template-nginx
Template tooling version used: 0.22

item.name: Nginx: Get stub status page
item.description: The following status information is provided: Active connections - the current number of active client connections including Waiting connections. Accepts - the total number of accepted client connections. Handled - the total number of handled connections. Generally, the parameter value is the same as accepts unless some resource limits have been reached (for example, the worker_connections limit). Requests - the total number of client requests. Reading - the current number of connections where nginx is reading the request header. Writing - the current number of connections where nginx is writing the response back to the client. Waiting - the current number of idle client connections waiting for a request.

item.name: Nginx: Requests total
item.description: The total number of client requests.

item.name: Nginx: Requests per second
item.description: The total number of client requests.

item.name: Nginx: Connections accepted per second
item.description: The total number of accepted client connections.

item.name: Nginx: Connections dropped per second
item.description: The total number of dropped client connections.

item.name: Nginx: Connections handled per second
item.description: The total number of handled connections. Generally, the parameter value is the same as accepts unless some resource limits have been reached (for example, the worker_connections limit).

item.name: Nginx: Connections active
item.description: The current number of active client connections including Waiting connections.

item.name: Nginx: Connections reading
item.description: The current number of connections where nginx is reading the request header.

item.name: Nginx: Connections waiting
item.description: The current number of idle client connections waiting for a request.

item.name: Nginx: Connections writing
item.description: The current number of connections where nginx is writing the response back to the client.

trigger.expression: {Template App Nginx by HTTP:nginx.get_stub_status.str("HTTP/1.1 200")}=0 or {Template App Nginx by HTTP:nginx.get_stub_status.nodata(30m)}=1
trigger.name: Nginx: Failed to fetch stub status page (or no data for 30m)
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Zabbix has not received data for items for the last 30 minutes.

trigger.name: Nginx: Service response time is too high (over {$NGINX.RESPONSE_TIME.MAX.WARN}s for 5m)
Nginx: High connections drop rate (more than {$NGINX.DROP_RATE.MAX.WARN} for 5m)
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. The dropping rate connections is greater than {$NGINX.DROP_RATE.MAX.WARN} for the last 5 minutes.

trigger.expression: {Template App Nginx by HTTP:nginx.version.diff()}=1 and {Template App Nginx by HTTP:nginx.version.strlen()}>0
trigger.name: Nginx: Version has changed (new version: {ITEM.VALUE})
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Nginx version has changed. Ack to close.
